alert.note: Alert for Big Stone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN BIG STONE...EASTERN DEUEL AND EASTERN GRANT COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM CDT... At 822 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Milbank to Tunerville to near Brandt. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Milbank, Ortonville, Clear Lake, Big Stone City, Gary, Odessa, Revillo, Artichoke, La Bolt, Altamont, Correll, Johnson, Albee, Moritz, Lagoona Beach, Lake Cochrane Rec Area, Artichoke Lake, Tunerville, Lake Alice, and Big Stone Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
